alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 10:24PM EDT until June 26 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sampson County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1024 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lillington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Dunn, Benson, Erwin, Coats, Four Oaks, Newton Grove, Spivey`s Corner and Buies Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
